name: Darkness (Marian Madalin)
description:
You must pass the levels by collecting all orbs and passing through the portal. Use your skill and your special ability to pass the level.

Requirements

SO: Android

Recommended Android Version: 5.1.1 or above

Memory: 1 GB RAM or more

Storage: 150 MB available space

Controls

Move - Left corner arrows

Jump - Right corner arrow

Special ability - Left side button
